true_positives.title: Missing TLS verification and HTTPS enforcement in OpsGenie API calls
true_positives.exploit_summary: Requests to OpsGenie API may be exposed to MITM if TLS verification is disabled or URL uses HTTP; credentials and payloads could be intercepted or tampered.
true_positives.impact_description: Potential credential leakage and manipulation of Alert payloads; reduces security posture of alerting integration.
true_positives.code_snippet:
response = requests.post(
    f'{self.api_url}/v2/alerts',
    json=payload,
    headers=headers,
    timeout=10,
    )
